tool.name: OGS: constructMeshesFromGeometry
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'constructMeshesFromGeometry'.

param.name: searchlength
param.label: searchlength
param.help: search length determining radius for the node search algorithm.

param.help: the file name of the input geometry,
